attributes.additional_details: Advise employers within Britain to allow employee's either a paid or unpaid day off work on 12/07/21 in order to celebrate and recover from the Euro 2020 final which takes place the day prior. There should be no retribution upon employee's who exercise their right to not attend work and instead celebrate on this day any way they see fit.
attributes.background:
In recognition of England reaching/winning the Euro 2020 final.

Allow the country a national day of celebration on Monday 12th July 2021 to acknowledge and enjoy the achievements of the England nation football team during Euro 2020. #ItsComingHome

rejection.details:
This would have been a decision for employers, or you could have signed this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
